name: TheSoundofWater
0:
”Alexa, open The Sound of Water”
”Alexa, ask The Sound of Water to play Madagascar”
”Alexa, ask The Sound of Water to skip streams”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the sound of water
des:
Welcome to The Sound of Water by WaterAid. Drift away to the far corners of the world as you listen to the calming sound of rivers, lakes, and waterfalls. To get started, just say “Alexa, open The Sound of Water”
___________

SKIP STREAMS

You can listen to water sounds from Pakistan, Uganda, Zambia, England, Madagascar or Nepal. If you know the stream you want, simply ask for it directly by saying e.g. “Alexa, ask the Sound of Water to Play Zambia” or say “Alexa, ask the Sound of Water to list streams” to hear the location list . You can also say “Alexa, skip streams” to switch to a different water sound.
___________

SET A SLEEP TIMER

Each stream is around 45 minutes long but you can set a sleep timer by saying “Alexa, open The Sound of Water for 20 minutes”, or for however long you’d like. Once the stream has started, you can also set up a timer by saying “Alexa, set a sleep timer for 20 minutes”.
___________

ABOUT WATERAID

Clean water, decent toilets, and good hygiene are basic human rights. They should be a normal part of daily life for everyone, everywhere – but they aren't. That's where WaterAid comes in. For more info about our work, just say “Alexa, ask The Sound of Water to tell me about WaterAid” or go to www.wateraid.org


The Sound of Water will never store any personal user data and we will never be able to access any user audio.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
